profile.name: Injilio Oroh
profile.title: Visual Effect Artist, Motion Graphic Designer, Video Editor
profile.bio: Creative and detail-oriented Multimedia Designer & Visual Artist with expertise in visual effects, motion graphics, video editing, and cinematic color grading. Skilled in producing advertisements, event trailers, branding visuals, and digital media content.

experience.desc: Produced professional advertisement video for vendor, designed event lanyard, created registration bumper video with logo animation intro.
Designed and edited official Filkom Day trailer video with visual effects (VFX) and motion graphics.

projects.title: Event Advertisement Video
projects.summary: Professional advertisement for Proxo Coris vendor with concept development and final delivery.

projects.title: Filkom Day Trailer
projects.summary: Official event trailer featuring VFX and motion graphics for university event.

projects.title: Event Branding Design
projects.summary: Complete branding materials including lanyard design and logo animations.
